DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Tolerability Raxibacumab Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Key Male female , 18 year age old Normal laboratory ( blood test ) result Subjects eligible enter study pregnant nursing , sterile nonchildbearing potential , willing practice abstinence use appropriate birth control method study ( 2 month ) Key History significant , acute chronic disease ( ie , heart , lung , gastrointestinal , liver , kidney , neurological infectious disease ) . Prior immunization anthrax vaccine adsorb ( AVA ) , prior treatment investigational anthrax therapy , prior treatment anthrax exposure , prior anthrax infection . History Type I hypersensitivity reaction food drug , IV contrast agent , antihistamine , history hive . A current drug alcohol addiction . Positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV1 ) , Hepatitis B surface antigen , Hepatitis C antibody . Cancer within last 5 year ( exception adequately treat basal cell carcinoma skin situ carcinoma cervix ) . Participation within 60 day intiating study refusal refrain participation study clinical trial investigational compound . Previous exposure raxibacumab .
